SELECT tuj.id,tuj.user_id,tu.`name`,tu.nickname,tu.phone,tu.student_num,tuj.upload_id,tuj.equipment_id, date_format(tuj.save_time, '%Y-%m-%d') save_time, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.read_duration, 0.0) ) / count(*) read_duration, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.read_distance, 0.0) ) / count(*) read_distance, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.read_light, 0.0)) / count(*) read_light, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.look_phone_duration, 0.0 )) / SUM(tuj.look_phone_count) look_phone_duration,SUM(IFNULL( tuj.look_tv_computer_duration,0.0)) / SUM(tuj.look_tv_computer_count) look_tv_computer_duration, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.sit_tilt, 0.0)) / count(*) sit_tilt,date_format(tur.reminds_time,'%Y-%m-%d') reminds_time,tur.remindsNum, tut.userDurtion /20 AS userDurtion, sum(if(tuj.status=2,outdoors_duration,0)) outdoors_duration
FROM t_use_jianhuyi_log tuj LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON tu.id = tuj.user_id, ( SELECT upload_id, user_id, date_format(reminds_time, '%Y-%m-%d') reminds_time, COUNT(*) remindsNum FROM t_use_reminds
and reminds_time like CONCAT('%',#{saveTime},'%')
GROUP BY user_id ) tur, ( SELECT `id`, `use_time`, `save_time`, user_id, upload_id, COUNT(*) userDurtion FROM t_use_time
and use_time like CONCAT('%',#{saveTime},'%')
GROUP BY user_id ) tut
and tuj.save_time like CONCAT('%',#{saveTime},'%') and tuj.upload_id = #{uploadId} and tuj.user_id = #{userId} AND tur.user_id = tuj.user_id AND tut.user_id = tuj.user_id AND tuj.`status` = 1
GROUP BY
date_format(tuj.save_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
tuj.user_id

SELECT IFNULL(tuj.id, '') AS 数据id, IFNULL(tuj.user_id, '') AS 用户id, IFNULL(tu.`name`, '') AS 用户姓名, IFNULL(tu.phone, '') AS 手机号, IFNULL(tu.student_num, '') AS 学号, IFNULL(tuj.upload_id, '') AS 上传人id, IFNULL(tuj.equipment_id, '') AS 设备号, date_format( IFNULL(tuj.save_time, ''), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS 使用时间, SUM( IFNULL(tuj.read_duration, 0.0) ) / count(*) 平均阅读时长, SUM( IFNULL(tuj.read_distance, 0.0) ) / count(*) 平均阅读距离, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.read_light, 0.0)) / count(*) 平均阅读光照, SUM( IFNULL( tuj.look_phone_duration, 0.0 ) ) / SUM(tuj.look_phone_count) 平均看手机时长, SUM( IFNULL( tuj.look_tv_computer_duration, 0.0 ) ) / SUM(tuj.look_tv_computer_count) 平均看电子屏时长, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.sit_tilt, 0.0)) / count(*) 平均坐姿角度, IFNULL(tur.remindsNum, '') AS 提醒次数, IFNULL(tut.userDurtion * 3, '') AS 有效使用时长, IFNULL( outdoor.outdoors_duration, '' ) AS 户外使用时长 FROM t_use_jianhuyi_log tuj LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON tu.id = tuj.user_id, ( SELECT upload_id, user_id, date_format(reminds_time, '%Y-%m-%d') reminds_time, COUNT(*) remindsNum FROM t_use_reminds
and reminds_time like CONCAT('%',#{saveTime},'%')
GROUP BY user_id ) tur, ( SELECT `id`, `use_time`, `save_time`, user_id, upload_id, COUNT(*) userDurtion FROM t_use_time
and use_time like CONCAT('%',#{saveTime},'%')
GROUP BY user_id ) tut,
( SELECT user_id, SUM(outdoors_duration) outdoors_duration FROM t_use_jianhuyi_log
and save_time like CONCAT('%',#{saveTime},'%') AND `status` = 2
GROUP BY user_id ) outdoor
and tuj.save_time like CONCAT('%',#{saveTime},'%') and tuj.upload_id = #{uploadId} and tuj.user_id = #{userId} AND tur.user_id = tuj.user_id AND tut.user_id = tuj.user_id and outdoor.user_id = tuj.user_id AND tuj.`status` = 1
GROUP BY
date_format(tuj.save_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
tuj.user_id

SELECT COUNT(*) from ( SELECT tuj.user_id, tuj.upload_id, tuj.equipment_id, date_format(tuj.save_time, '%Y-%m-%d') save_time, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.read_duration, 0.0)) / count(read_duration) read_duration, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.read_distance, 0.0)) / count(read_distance) read_distance, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.read_light, 0.0)) / count(read_light) read_light, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.look_phone_duration, 0.0)) / SUM(tuj.look_phone_count) look_phone_duration, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.look_tv_computer_duration,0.0)) / SUM(tuj.look_tv_computer_count) look_tv_computer_duration, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.sit_tilt, 0.0)) / count(sit_tilt) sit_tilt, sum(if(tuj.status=2,outdoors_duration,0)) outdoors_duration FROM t_use_jianhuyi_log tuj GROUP BY substr(tuj.save_time, 1, 10),tuj.user_id ORDER BY substr(tuj.save_time, 1, 10) DESC ) zo
and zo.upload_id = #{uploadId} and zo.user_id = #{userId} and zo.save_time >= #{startTime} and zo.save_time <= #{endTime}
select count(*) from t_use_jianhuyi_log where save_time >= date_sub(#{saveTime}, INTERVAL - 0 DAY) AND save_time < date_sub(#{saveTime}, INTERVAL -1 DAY) and user_id = #{userId}

SELECT `id`, `user_id`, status, save_time, `add_time`, `read_duration`, `outdoors_duration`, `read_distance`, `read_light`, `look_phone_duration`, `look_phone_count`, `look_tv_computer_duration`, `look_tv_computer_count`, `sit_tilt`, `use_jianhuyi_duration`, `sport_duration`, `del_flag` FROM t_use_jianhuyi_log where save_time like CONCAT('%',#{saveTime},'%') and user_id= #{userId}

select `id`,status,`user_id`,save_time,`add_time`,`read_duration`,`outdoors_duration`,`read_distance`,`read_light`,`look_phone_duration`,`look_phone_count`,`look_tv_computer_duration`,`look_tv_computer_count`,`sit_tilt`,`use_jianhuyi_duration`,`sport_duration`,`del_flag` from t_use_jianhuyi_log where save_time between #{start} and #{end} and user_id= #{userId}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT tuj.user_id, tuj.upload_id, tuj.equipment_id, date_format(tuj.save_time, '%Y-%m-%d') save_time, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.read_duration, 0.0)) / count(*) read_duration, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.read_distance, 0.0)) / count(*) read_distance, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.read_light, 0.0)) / count(*) read_light, SUM( IFNULL(tuj.look_phone_duration, 0.0) ) / SUM(tuj.look_phone_count) look_phone_duration, SUM( IFNULL( tuj.look_tv_computer_duration, 0.0 ) ) / SUM(tuj.look_tv_computer_count) look_tv_computer_duration, SUM(IFNULL(tuj.sit_tilt, 0.0)) / count(*) sit_tilt, outdoor.outdoors_duration FROM t_use_jianhuyi_log tuj, ( SELECT user_id, SUM(outdoors_duration) outdoors_duration FROM t_use_jianhuyi_log WHERE `status` = 2 GROUP BY substr(save_time, 1, 10), user_id ) outdoor WHERE tuj.status =1 GROUP BY substr(tuj.save_time, 1, 10), tuj.user_id ORDER BY substr(tuj.save_time, 1, 10) DESC ) a
